Buckle up for a surprisingly exciting crash course on serotonin.
The results of a new study on long Covid are out, and they’re more than promising they might even be groundbreaking.

articles.author: Kristen Fischer
articles.title: Large study shows effects of Covid vaccine in pregnancy on newborns - Yahoo Life
articles.description: Receiving a Covid vaccine during pregnancy was not linked to adverse outcomes in baby’s first 6 months—and was even protective against more than just Covid.
articles.content: It can be worrying to roll up your sleeve for a vaccine in pregnancy, but the benefits of doing so largely outweigh any possible risksboth for you and your developing baby. Thats true for the flu sho… [+3347 chars]
